named-query.name: findUserByNickname
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.nickname = :nickname

named-query.name: findUserByNicknameAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.nickname = :nickname and u.encryptedPassword = :password

named-query.name: findTopUserByWins
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.nickname like :nickname
